SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - On how many days in the last week did your symptoms cause you to miss school or work or leave you unable to carry out your normal daily responsibilities?

Sheehan Disability Scale - On how many days in the last week did you feel so impaired by your symptoms, that even though you went to school or work or had other daily responsibilities, your productivity was reduced?
Sheehan Disability Scale - The symptoms have disrupted your family life/home responsibilities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SDS - Symptoms Disrupted Family Life/Home Responsibilities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - I have not worked/studied at all during the past week for reasons unrelated to the disorder.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SDS - Not Worked/Studied in Past Week for Reason Unrelated to Disorder

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - The symptoms have disrupted your social life/leisure activities.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: SDS - Symptoms Disrupted Social Life/Leisure Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Sheehan Disability Scale - The symptoms have disrupted your work/school work.
